extendedInfo.description: Share Keyboard & Mouse (Beta) Control your Droid from your desktop with MOUSE and KEYBOARD. Just like a Synergy.# ShareKM is a very handy tool for Android that lets you share your computer's Mouse, Keyboard and Clipboard. You can download PC app at http://goo.gl/khfEb.# Features list:  + Control Droid with desktop Keyboard and Mouse.  + Muti-touch: Drag mouse while pressing ctrl key.  + Copy a block of text from your computer, paste it on your Droid.  + Copy some text from your Droid, paste it back to your computer.  + Shortcuts: Mouse right/middle click(ex Back button on Droid), F1~F12. All shortcuts are fully customizable.  + Control the device volume with the computer ctrl-down + mouse wheel.  + Screen on/off control when you switch Android and PC.# Restriction:  If your device is not ROOTED, you can use only USB connection.  Bluetooth connection : Microsoft bluetooth stack is recommanded.# Permission explanation:  + SYSTEM_ALERT_WINDOW: To create cursor layer.  + INTERNET: To connect with PC.  + BLUETOOTH_ADMIN, BLUETOOTH: To connect via bluetooth.  + ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE, ACCESS_WIFI_STATE: To connect via WIFI.  + WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: To save settings.# Website:  + Go to http://goo.gl/khfEb to find out more.Tags: remote control mouse keyboard share clipboard synergy wifi usb bluetooth

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: A really nice app that works flawlessly.   Will recommend this to anyone who are looking for a perfect way to actually control their phones with a keyboard & mouse; in a way that AirDroid doesn\'t allow.
reviews.author: Luke Clements

reviews.title: Good, but some bugs
reviews.comment: That\'s a fantastic app. Thanks for developing it. But here are some recommendations. First, please integrate other languages than English. I usually switch between various languages, but cannot do so with ShareKM. Second, if I want to disconnect the mobile phone safely after I have used SharedKM, Windows will not allow me to do so due to some ADB process unless I kill the process by means of the taskmanager. THird, sometimes the program kept on connecting and disconnecting to the phone.
reviews.author: Tomek Park

reviews.title: Amazing Synergy substitute
reviews.comment: Considering synergy does not yet support android, we are forced to use applications like this one. But this one works amazingly, so what does it matter really? We have also discoverd a skilled developer!
reviews.author: Nic Strike

reviews.title: Well played brobeans!
reviews.comment: As a fan of Synergy, I must say I am impressed, found this by Googling \"Synergy for Android\", and it works flawlessly, well done!
reviews.author: Kenny Crous

reviews.title: pretty cool
reviews.comment: This is really great using with my note 2 together with the smart dock.  I used to put additional USB keyboard and mouse, but not anymore. Kudos to the devs. Can improve by adding a total keyboard mapping for playing music, volume controls, email launch, etc.
reviews.author: MJ Quintana

reviews.title: Just awesome
reviews.comment: It is very difficult at times when u are on a PC as well as chatting from android. This application let\'s u manage both of PC and android with same pair of keyboard and mouse. I am looking forward to having this app transmitting screen on the PC...
reviews.author: Siddharth Thakurdesai

reviews.comment: This app is amazing.  i have a dock next to my screen and its connected via usb.  its perfect.  i can play video games or watch a movie, then all i do is pause what im doing, move the cursor to my android phone and start typin away on my pc keyboard.  Really awesome app.
reviews.author: Armando De Leon

reviews.title: Does not work
reviews.comment: Followed instructions exactly as stated... Had phone and computer on same wifi... It flat out doesn\'t work. Tried on two comps. Also when typing IP address, it won\'t let you enter a period... Very annoying
reviews.author: Preston Pierson

reviews.title: Good work
reviews.comment: I use similar software to work between multiple pc\'s and to be able to do this with my tablet or phone is just grate. A little glichy but hay its still in beta. on another hote it would be grate if you added the ability to use multiple devices at once. To be able to connect my tablet and my phone at the same time would top this off nicely. good job and keep ite up.
reviews.author: skyler berntsen

reviews.title: Works Like Charm
reviews.comment: Finally I\'m able to make full use of my fatty fingers and faster typing with lesser mistakes.  Thank you developer!
reviews.author: Muhammad Edwin Masripan

reviews.title: Brilliant!
reviews.comment: Does what it says on the tin! Primarily, I wanted to be able to type texts on my phone, using the computer keyboard without sending to a 3rd party via the cloud and now I can. Using it to control my Xperia SP via a USB connection.
reviews.author: Dom W

reviews.title: Perfect companion for a Note 2 on a desktop dock
reviews.comment: I use my Note 2 to listen to music at work and this allows me to quickly adjust what I\'m listening to.  It also makes it very easy to reply to text messages.  The documentation is a little light but the F keys to control the phone make this app spectacular!
reviews.author: Ben Ellis

reviews.title: Works exactly as described
reviews.comment: I love being able to use my Android phone as my extended desktop. It makes replying to SMS messages as simple as using a chat app on the PC desktop. It also makes debugging WebKit applications totally seamless with Google Chrome Beta connected to the Chrome Canary remote inspector that works over the same USB cable as the ShareKM app.
reviews.author: Andra\305\276 Kos

reviews.title: Great app. nice work... love it !!
reviews.comment: With this app, its just like another screen in my pc. I can use whatsapp and other texting apps along working on pc. Its just so useful. I think if you are work on pc/laptop for the most of the time then it is must have app for you. You don\'t need to get off your hands from keyboard/mouse. :)
reviews.author: nirmit patel

reviews.title: Works great!
reviews.comment: Just like a dual windows desktop.  Best feature is copy and paste text between windows and android desktop.  Function key actions (home, end, etc) are a bit counter-intuative for me.
reviews.author: Scott Elliott

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: This app changed my life. I use a pc with two monitors and being able to use my note 2 as a third (with the added bonus of txting) is amazing. Thanks so much
reviews.author: Michael Michta

reviews.title: Works great, easy to use
reviews.comment: I now use this every day and I\'m very happy with it! Just like Synergy for Android - mouse moves seamlessly off the PC monitor and on to the phone screen. Keyboard works great but some keys (home, end, delete) don\'t always do what\'s expected.
reviews.author: Jim Doria

reviews.title: SUPERB
reviews.comment: This app is top-notch. I can\'t believe how flawless things work even if my phone isn\'t rooted. I\'d pay for it right away if it weren\'t free. My only gripe is I can\'t find a way to disable the on-screen keyboard while the app is active. The app deserves 5 stars nonetheless.
reviews.author: Kevin Frianeza

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Does exactly what you expect, no bugs or crashes. I would like some support for Cyrillic keyboard but still - 5 stars
reviews.author: Alexander Popov

reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY GENIOUS
reviews.comment: THANK YOUUU! This works super great on Nexus 7, only thing that needs fixing is some of the special characters that are misplaced, other than that this is just perfect! Keep up the great work!
reviews.author: Bernardo Rocha Pinho
